ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Timetrunc problem
ygData.msgSnippet: Time-truncation should be thought of as a feature, rather than a problem/error. If you set timeout-seconds to 0, no practical limit will be applied. Then,

Subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Timetrunc problem

Time-truncation should be thought of as a feature, rather than a 
problem/error.

If you set 'timeout-seconds' to 0, no practical limit will be 
applied. Then, your fetches may wait forever for certain trap 
sites to complete their responses.

So, pick your poison.

- Gordon @ IA

> 
>
